name: Ruin Runner (NotJoseph)
description:
Instruction: 

Up Arrow key = Move up, Down Arrow Key = Move down

Ruin Runner is a simple, barebone, endless runner game that I made for an endless runner project in my game dev course. Thankfully, the requirements for the uni project are not hard (only asking to have thing such as an animated character that can move up or down, and etc)

However, I didn't want to feel like this was too easy, so I challenged myself to try developing the whole game in just 1 day (excluding creating a webgl build and publishing it to itch.io because I became really sick while working on this, so I had to continue doing that the next day).

All pre-made assets used in this game are sourced as royalty free or on public domain.
